meanings.definition: A place where cider is made.
meanings.sent1: The cidery was filled with the sweet scent of apples.
meanings.sent2: We visited a local cidery to learn how they make their delicious cider.
meanings.sent3: The mice in the cidery were probably drunk on all the spilled cider!
meanings.sent4: The cidery was a hive of activity, buzzing with workers and the sound of machinery.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the cidery felt like stepping into a world of apple-scented magic.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cider.
meanings.sent1: The cidery aroma filled the air, making us crave a glass of cider.
meanings.sent2: Her cidery smile reminded me of the crisp taste of apple cider.
meanings.sent3: The cidery music playing in the background added a festive touch to the party.
meanings.sent4: The cidery colors of red and gold decorated the room for the cider-themed event.
meanings.sent5: The cidery atmosphere of the orchard was peaceful and inviting, perfect for enjoying a glass of cider.
